abstract: United States Supreme Court orders delay in deciding whether former Va Gov Bob McDonnell will have to appeal corruption convictions from prison; lower court had rejected an earlier request to remain free.
lead_paragraph: The United States Supreme Court wants to hear from federal prosecutors before deciding whether former Gov. Bob McDonnell must go to prison while he appeals corruption convictions.
snippet: The United States Supreme Court wants to hear from federal prosecutors before deciding whether former Gov. Bob McDonnell must go to prison while he appeals corruption convictions.
